Author: -wemeyeo
Text: thanks that’s really kind (: and you’re right , a few days is okay completely...but the thing is it hasn’t been a few days, more like a few weeks. but it’ll be all good soon im sure yknow

Author: Rickticia
Text: I’m so sorry you’re going though this. Breakups are shitty as hell, and it’s okay to cope with more food. This won’t make you fat over a few days.
